text: Daniel Šlachta (13 February 1923 - 16 April 2007) was a Slovak alpine skier. He competed in three events at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Slovak male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Czechoslovakia Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Žilina
title: Daniel Šlachta
